hero.introduction: Hi! I'm 25 years old, and passionate about web development. I love creating digital solutions that combine design, functionality, and a healthy dose of creativity. Here, I share some of my projects and my enjoyment of building with code.

project1.title: Veterinary Appointment Manager
project1.desc: This project allows you to add patients, veterinarians, and appointments, as well as view, modify, and delete scheduled appointments.

project2.title: Expense Planner
project2.desc: This project lets you set a budget, record expenses, and view expenses by category.

project3.title: Cryptocurrency Quoter
project3.desc: Fetches data from an API to display the current price of a cryptocurrency based on the selected currency.

project4.title: Django CRUD
project4.desc: Login system and CRUD operations on products.

project5.title: React and Sequelize CRUD
project5.desc: React frontend with TypeScript and a backend using Sequelize and Node. Uses CORS, Morgan, and Express; includes tests and validations.

project6.title: Reservation Manager
project6.desc: Login and user registration system with CRUD operations for reservations and users.

project7.title: Rockstargames site
project7.desc: Fullstack project using a headless CMS, website with blog posts and image gallery

project8.title: Landing page SoltechMx
project8.desc: Landing page about personal project called Soltechmx

gc1Holding.title: GC1 Holding (January 2025 - Present)
gc1Holding.work: Development and maintenance of websites as well as maintenance of AWS instances
gc1Holding.technologies: Technologies: React, Node.js, MongoDB, AWS, Bootstrap

coppel.title: Coppel (December 2023 - July 2024)
coppel.work: Learning about work methodology within the Scrum framework and training in web development
coppel.technologies: Technologies: PHP, MySQL, ColdFusion, and Scrum
